author: Sabina Graves
title: DC Comics at Theme Parks Has Had a Bizarre History but ‘Superman’ Could Change That
description: It's time for DC Studios' new Man of Steel to restart not just the film universe but entertainment and attractions too.
content: There’s nostalgia for the Batman movie era at Six Flags as we head toward a new DC Studios era with Superman, On a recent visit to Magic Mountain, I found myself reminiscing fondly about the stunt sh… [+9222 chars]
